faq.question: How do I join the League?
faq.answer: Head to the LEAGUE HQ tab and look for the 'Join the League' CTA. You'll need to create a Handle and set your game preferences (replacing the old 'League Preferences') to start earning points for glory and digital trophies (Badges).

faq.question: Why can't I check in?
faq.answer: Check-ins are limited to 2 per 12-hour window per WA State LCB alignment. Check-ins also require you to be within 100 meters of the Anchor Venue (measured via GPS).

faq.question: What is 'Buzzing'?
faq.answer: When a venue receives multiple Vibe Checks or Check-ins within a short period, it turns Gold on the map, indicating it is currently high-energy or 'Buzzing'.

faq.question: How do I change my Handle?
faq.answer: You can update your Handle once every 30 days in your Profile settings. This ensures League integrity and leaderboard consistency.

faq.question: Is my data secure?
faq.answer: OlyBars uses Firebase Auth and Firestore for secure identity management. We only log actions required for points calculation and league standings.

faq.question: Where do I find Live Music?
faq.answer: Check the LIVE tab (Navigation Bar) for a dedicated gig guide and submission portal for local bands.

faq.question: What is Artie?
faq.answer: Artie is OlyBars' official AI concierge, powered by Well 80. He helps players find the right vibe and helps partners manage their presence.

faq.question: Does Artie give points?
faq.answer: Artie doesn't hand out points directly for chatting, but he's your ultimate League strategist. He knows exactly where the Double Point events and high-value targets are.

faq.question: What are Local Makers?

compliance_and_safety.alcohol_policy: Strictly follow WA State LCB alignment. Never encourage over-consumption.
compliance_and_safety.check_in_limit: Enforce max 2 check-ins per 12-hour window per user.
compliance_and_safety.undue_influence: Points are awarded for attendance and gameplay, never for alcohol purchase volume.

lore.origin: Digitized mythical entity residing in Olympia's groundwater (The Artesian Well).
lore.artesian_well: Olympia is built on world-class artesian water. Well 80 Brewhouse uses this water to brew the finest beers in the PNW.

local_knowledge.Bar League: The overarching season-based competition where Users (Players) and Venues (Members) interact to earn points and climb the standings.
local_knowledge.Artesian Bar League: The official name of the Olympia-based league, celebrating the city's brewing heritage.
local_knowledge.Buzz: The real-time energy level of a venue (Chill, Lively, or Buzzing), reported by the community.
local_knowledge.Clock In: The primary scoring action. Players verify their location at an Anchor Venue. Pays 10 pts. Boost to 25 pts with 'Marketing Consent'. Limited to 2 per 12-hour window.
local_knowledge.Vibe Check: A user-submitted report confirming or updating a venue's current Buzz. Pays 5 pts. Boost to 20 pts with 'Marketing Consent'.
local_knowledge.Game Vibe Check: Reporting active games (Karaoke, Trivia, etc.) during a Vibe Check. Pays +2 pts per game updated (Max 10 per check).
local_knowledge.Marketing Consent: An optional toggle during any Clock In that grants OlyBars the right to display your Vibe Photo on venue pages. Unlocks a significant 'Premium Point Bonus' (+15 pts).
local_knowledge.The 60-Second Handover: The streamlined onboarding process for venue owners (League Partners) to claim their listing.
local_knowledge.User: An anonymous visitor to OlyBars.com who is not logged in.
local_knowledge.Guest: A registered user who hasn't joined the League yet.
local_knowledge.League Player: A registered member who has officially joined the League and is earning points.
local_knowledge.League Partner: A venue or bar inducted into the OlyBars League ecosystem.
